### Installation ####
-Unzip the content of this archive to a folder and add it to the Matlab path list
-Download and install the academic version of Gurobi from https://user.gurobi.com/download/licenses/free-academic
-Download and install libSBML and the Matlab interface (SBMLToolbox) from sbml.org/Software/libSBML
-Write checkInstallation at the Matlab prompt to see that everything seems to be working for the solvers that you installed.

Rasmus Agren 2017-02-019
Daniel Hermansson 2016-09-01
